img_text: 12:43 Chrissah Shaw 16 mins. First ever promise ring. I'm shocked cause it's different for me I can admit it's taking me a minute to get use to being this showered with love because I was always the one to quickly give out love and to love MORE than the next person. Shorts done changed my demeanor, motives, and saved me from what I THOUGHT was "love. Feels beyond amazing. Realizing my worth and yours is THE BEST thing that's ever happened to me 10 Lemme stop here and give shorts a round of applause I said yes - est. 04/01/19&w QUESTIO TO ASK I'm officially taken
